sentences.english: Stable two-way shape memory effect can be gained by thermo-mechanical cycling.
sentences.chinese: 通过训练可以获得稳定的双程记忆效应。

sentences.english: I want to purchase a round trip ticket to Chengdu.
sentences.chinese: 我想买张去成都的双程票。

sentences.english: The employee will be entitled to only one round trip ticket to serve for both the business trip and the vacation.
sentences.chinese: 员工的商务出差和度假只能享有一张双程票。

sentences.english: In this paper, we report the experimental results of a two-pass amplification atomic iodine laser amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 本文报道了双程放大碘原子激光放大器的实验结果。

sentences.english: Two-way memory effect and the abnormal deformation phenomenon were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了合金的双程记忆效应与异常形变现象。

sentences.english: They're not going with round-trip tickets.
Round-trip tickets from Frankfurtto Singapore sank to less than $700.
sentences.chinese: 从法兰克福到新加破的双程机票跌到不到700美金。

sentences.english: A structure of off-axes double passes amplifier is used.
sentences.chinese: 激光放大系统采用离轴双程放大结构。

sentences.english: This is where the double haul form of casting becomes essential.
sentences.chinese: 这是双程铸造成了必不可少的形式。

definition: airport construction fee (abbr. for 機場建設費|机场建设费)
shuttle bus (or train)/train or bus traveling only part of its normal route
to ride as a passenger (in a car, boat, plane etc)
Hong Kong LRT (Light Rail Transit) (abbr. for 輕便鐵路|轻便铁路)
